Title: Relates to procurement contracts
Summary: Provides that a procurement contract shall mean any contract or other agreement for an article of procurement involving an estimated annualized expenditure in excess of twenty-five thousand dollars; increases such amount from fifteen thousand dollars.
LawCode: Amd §16, Chap 1 of 2005; amd §§139-j & 139-k, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 1 of the laws of 2005, amending the state finance law relating to restricting contacts in the procurement process and the recording of contacts relating thereto, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to procurement contracts
